article_title: Veterans Journal: World War II Foundation is seeking artifacts and volunteers
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: The World War II Foundation, based in Kingston, R.I., is looking for donations of authentic World War II artifacts and items to use in the production of its films and to aid in fundraising for its documentaries. WWII veterans are also sought for a Veterans Day ceremony at URI.
article_metadata.author: George W. Reilly
